title: Stock Futures Pause Ahead of Fed Decision
sub_head: Dow is on course to edge lower, a day after the blue-chip index closed above 36000 for the first time
body:
U.S. stock futures hovered Wednesday as investors awaited the conclusion of the Federal Reserveâ€™s monetary policy meeting and a raft of economic data.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average each edged down 0.1% Wednesday, while technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures were flat. On Tuesday, the Dow closed above 36000 for the first time, while the other two indexes also set record highs.
